data.message: My Instagram business page has accidentally been deleted and it's linked with my Facebook business page also linked with my credit card I cannot make a new Instagram business page because it says it's still linked with my Facebook one can you help

replies.message: Hi Bear. We're sorry you're having issues with your Instagram account. For help troubleshooting Instagram issues, please head to our Instagram Help Center: help.instagram.com. Specific information on linking accounts and Instagram for Business can be found here: http://bit.ly/2pkvq9K. Thank you! -Elizabeth
I still can't find my page
